xwikidoc.name: ClassTemplate
xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content: <!-- replace Main with the Space where you want your documents to be created --> <!-- replace the default parent with the one of your choice --> <!-- Save this template using the ’Save’ button --> #set( $class = $doc.name.substring(0,$doc.name.indexOf("Class"))) #set($defaultparent = "XWiki.${class}Class") #set($defaultweb = "Main") #includeForm("XWiki.ClassSheet")
